title: Will The ‘Mask Rebellion’ Fuel a Republican Landslide?
sub_head: New York’s Rep. Kathleen Rice is the latest moderate Democrat to announce her retirement from Congress.
body:
Another day, another moderate House Democrat decides not to seek re-election. Maybe it isn’t a great strategy after all for leftists to insult fellow Democrats until they agree to support things voters don’t want.
John Wagner notes in the Washington Post:
